public interface zeta.session.Shell

(source file: Shell.pizza)
java.lang.Object
   |
   +----zeta.session.Shell
The pure class interface. 
public interface Shell
The type of shells .

A shell registers at a session to be responsible for the execution of forms. The shell is notified by the session manager when the session form has been changed.

Author:
Wolfgang Grieskamp (wg@cs.tu-berlin.de)
Version: $Id: Shell.pizza,v 1.5 1998/10/22 09:02:24 wg Exp $
See also:
Form, registerShell

exec(String, TopLevelForm)
Modal execute the given form in this shell
notifyFormRegister(TopLevelForm)
Notify the shell that the given top-level form has been added
notifyFormUnregister(TopLevelForm)
Notify the shell that the given top-level form has been removed

exec
public abstract void exec(String prompt,
                          TopLevelForm form)
  throws zeta.session.Failures.FormFailed;
Modal execute the given form in this shell.

notifyFormRegister

public abstract void notifyFormRegister(TopLevelForm form);
Notify the shell that the given top-level form has been added. This typically results in that the shell updates its syntax (for command operation) resp. its view (for gui operation).

See also:
registerForm

notifyFormUnregister

public abstract void notifyFormUnregister(TopLevelForm form);
Notify the shell that the given top-level form has been removed. This typically results in that the shell updates its syntax (for batch operation) resp. its view (for gui operation).

See also:
unregisterForm
